body_html: @zdevito I've integrated the use of at::Device into *TensorType, compiler, executor, python_arg_flatten. From what I've seen the only portion in JIT left to integrate at::Device in is ArgSpec and ArgInfo. But in our other thread you mentioned not to touch this portion of the code. Please advise on how to continue.

body: @zdevito I've integrated the use of at::Device into `*TensorType, compiler, executor, python_arg_flatten`. From what I've seen the only portion in JIT left to integrate `at::Device` in is ArgSpec and ArgInfo. But in our other thread you mentioned not to touch this portion of the code. Please advise on how to continue.
